name: Wargame: European Escalation - Fatal Error
summary: "Fatal Error", the 4th free DLC for Wargame: European Escalation, brings you a brand new 5-mission long Operation, as well as a new and finely tuned multi-touch gameplay for owners of Ultrabook with touch display. Inspired by Intel! This DLC focuses on solo play, adding a brand new fifth operation to Wargame's existing four.
